name: Train To Nowhere (itch)
description:
Made for the Input Optional Jam (Hits the Spot) in 2019

Have you ever just got on a train, found just the right spot, and zoned out watching people and scenery come and go? This simulates that experience.

Solo "game" made in a weekend, so it's much more barebones than I had planned. Everything is randomly generated, just watch the train and passengers come and go on designated stations, with stats you can hover for your amusement.

Generation sources:
Passengers: Fighting Baseball (SNES)
Stations: Transport Tycoon
Rest: My own crazy mind
